content: into both the loops once 2 you have finished seaming all the way around cut your yarn leaving a 6 tail and pull through the loop on your hook ● *note if you are still having trouble after looking at the photo tutorial this video can help you with this technique finishing ● weave in your ends from the seaming all your other ends should be woven in ● get those dishes done thank you thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it i do offer pattern support so if you have any questions or find any errors feel free to message me @stopitharry on ravelry and i d be happy to help feel free to sell as many of the finished items as you wish but i ask that if you share on social media you would link the pattern to its source and give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry enjoy photo tutorial 3 magic_ring 4 end of rnd1 5 end of rnd2 6 both circles complete 7 ws should be facing each other 8 seaming slip_stitch into both of the sts into both the loops make sure you don t skip any 9 continue in that fashion until you reach the end 10
